languages.text: {n}Друкари, склонившийся над телом, заточенным в странном аппарате-саркофаге, оборачивается. Лицо ксеноса скрыто зеркальной маской, а в руках он сжимает какие-то инструменты — скорее пыточные, нежели чем хирургические. Из-под маски доносится утробное шипение.{/n} "Что тебе нужно, ничтожество?"

{n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари, склонившийся над телом, заточенным в странном аппарате-саркофаге, оборачивается. Лицо ксеноса скрыто зеркальной маской, а в руках он сжимает какие-то инструменты — скорее пыточные, нежели чем хирургические. Из-под маски доносится утробное шипение.{/n} "Что тебе нужно, ничтожество?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was just leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind — they more resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask.{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask.{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask and he is holding tools of some kind. They more resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask.{/n} "What do you want, you twat?"

The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}奇妙な棺のような装置に包まれた体にもたれかかっていたデュカーリが振り向く。異種族の顔は鏡面のマスクで覆われ、何らかの道具を持っている。それはよく見るとチラージョンのものというより、拷問器具に似ている。マスクの奥から、小さなシューシューとした声が聞こえる。{/n}「何の用だ、家畜？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}奇妙な棺のような装置に包まれた体にもたれかかっていたデュカーリが振り向く。異種族の顔は鏡面のマスクで覆われ、何らかの道具を持っている。それはよく見るとチラージョンのものというより、拷問器具に似ている。マスクの奥から、小さなシューシューとした声が聞こえる。{/n}「何の用だ、家畜？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}黑暗灵族俯身看着一个被囚禁在古怪棺柩装置中的人，随后转过了身。他的脸上戴着一个类似镜子的面具，手里拿着某种器械。仔细打量的话，似乎不太像外科医生的手术工具，更像是用来折磨人的刑具。他的面具后面传来了嘶嘶的喉音。{/n}“你想干什么，畜生？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗灵族俯身看着一个被囚禁在古怪棺柩装置中的人，随后转过了身。他的脸上戴着一个类似镜子的面具，手里拿着某种器械，看起来不太像外科医生的手术工具，更像是用来折磨人的刑具。他的面具后面传来了嘶嘶的喉音。{/n}“你想干什么，你这个蠢货？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari, que acababa de inclinarse sobre un cuerpo encerrado en un extraño sarcófago, se da la vuelta. El rostro del xenos está cubierto por una máscara reflectante y sujeta unas herramientas desconocidas. Parecen más los instrumentos de un torturador que los de un cirujano. Un siseo gutural escapa tras la máscara.{/n} «¿Qué quieres, ganado?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari, que acababa de inclinarse sobre un cuerpo encerrado en un extraño sarcófago, se da la vuelta. El rostro del xenos está cubierto por una máscara reflectante y sujeta unas herramientas desconocidas. Parecen más los instrumentos de un torturador que los de un cirujano. Un siseo gutural escapa tras la máscara.{/n} «¿Qué quieres, ganado?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Der über eine merkwürdige, sarcophagus-ähnliche Apparatur gebeugte Drukhari wendet sich um. Das Gesicht des Xenos ist von einer Spiegelmaske verdeckt, und er hält sonderbare Werkzeuge in der Hand. Sie ähneln eher Folterwerkzeugen als chirurgischem Besteck. Ein raues Zischen ertönt von hinter der Maske.{/n} "Was wollt Ihr, Vieh?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari, der gerade über einen Körper in einer merkwürdigen, sarcophagus-ähnlichen Apparatur gebeugt war, dreht sich um. Das Gesicht des Xenos ist von einer Spiegelmaske verdeckt, und er hält sonderbare Werkzeuge in der Hand. Sie ähneln eher Folterwerkzeugen als chirurgischem Besteck. Ein raues Zischen ertönt von hinter der Maske.{/n} "Was wollt Ihr, Ihr Arschloch?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Penché sur un corps enfermé dans un étrange appareil en forme de sarcophage, le Drukhari se retourne vers vous. Le visage couvert par un masque en miroir, il tient à la main des outils qui ressemblent davantage à des instruments de torture qu'à du matériel médical. Un sifflement guttural vous parvient de derrière le masque.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous voulez, le bétail ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Penché sur un corps enfermé dans un étrange appareil en forme de sarcophage, le Drukhari se retourne vers vous. Le visage couvert par un masque en miroir, il tient à la main des outils qui ressemblent plus à des instruments de torture qu'à du matériel médical. Un sifflement guttural vous parvient de derrière le masque.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous voulez, vermine ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf, lahit benzeri bir cihaza hapsolmuş birisinin üzerine eğilen Drukhari, arkasını dönüyor. Zenonun suratına aynalı bir maske geçirilmiş, elinde de bir tür alet var. Elindeki, cerrah keskisinden ziyade işkence aletine benziyor. Maskenin ardından sesi duyulan zeno, gırtlaktan konuşup tıslıyor.{/n} "Ne istiyorsun sığır?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari, who was leaning over a body encased in a strange sarcophagus-like device, turns around. The xenos's face is covered by a mirrored mask, and he is holding tools of some kind. They more closely resemble a torturer's implements than those of a chirurgeon. A guttural hiss comes from behind the mask:{/n} "What do you want, cattle?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaf, lahit benzeri bir cihaza hapsolmuş birisinin üzerine eğilen Drukhari arkasını dönüyor. Zenonun suratında aynalı bir maske duruyor ve elinde bir tür alet var. Elindeki, cerrah keskisinden ziyade işkence aletine benziyor. Zeno, maskesinin ardından tıslarcasına gırtlaktan konuşuyor.{/n} "Ne istiyorsun sığır?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer
